zh.name: 宿舍区域
locations: 紫荆篮球场新民路旁停车带
紫荆网球场新民路旁停车带
紫荆园食堂正门和侧门的门口附近
待补充……（如有补充可点击右下角反馈🙏）
zh.note: 宿舍区请不要将车停到架空层

zh.name: 教学楼区域
locations: 一教至五教周边指定区域
六教（除架空层外）指定区域
一般院系楼外皆能停车
待补充……（如有补充可点击右下角反馈🙏）
zh.note: 请注意观察每个教学楼附近的停车标识，严格遵守停放规范

zh.name: 公共区域
locations: 图书馆周边皆可停，除李文正馆和逸夫馆有特殊要求外
综体北体周边暂无特殊规定皆可停车
食堂周边规划区域
待补充……（如有补充可点击右下角反馈🙏）
zh.note: 公共区域停车需特别注意不要影响行人通行

en.name: Dormitory Area
locations: Parking strip along Xinmin Road near Zijing Basketball Court
Parking strip along Xinmin Road near Zijing Tennis Court
Near the main and side entrances of Zijing Garden Cafeteria
To be updated... (Please click the feedback button in the bottom right corner if you have additions 🙏)
en.note: Please do not park in the piloti area of dormitory buildings

en.name: Teaching Building Area
locations: Designated areas around Teaching Buildings 1-5
Designated areas around Teaching Building 6 (except piloti area)
Generally allowed to park outside department buildings
To be updated... (Please click the feedback button in the bottom right corner if you have additions 🙏)
en.note: Please observe parking signs near each teaching building and strictly follow parking regulations

en.name: Public Areas
locations: Parking allowed around libraries, except special requirements for Li Wenzheng Library and Shaw Library
No special restrictions for parking around the Comprehensive Gym and North Gym
Planned areas around cafeterias
To be updated... (Please click the feedback button in the bottom right corner if you have additions 🙏)
en.note: When parking in public areas, please be especially careful not to obstruct pedestrian traffic
